data.text:
I got a workflow where I frequently do several "create screenshot" and then merge them together as a single composition.

I was wondering if someone would already be working on a checkbox in the "create screenshot" dialog that would enable "create as new layer" instead of new image, in order to greatly simplify that workflow.

Otherwise, I'll have a look at implementing this.
